import React, { Component } from 'react' import vote from '../utils/images/vote.jpeg' class LeaderCard extends Component { render() { const { user } = this.props const answers = Object.keys(user.answers).length const optionTwoCount = user.questions.length const total = optionOneCount + optionTwoCount const optionOnePercentage = ((optionOneCount * 100 ) / total ) +'%' const optionTwoPercentage = ((optionTwoCount * 100 ) / total ) + '%' return (
Would you rather {question.optionOne.text}
{optionOnePercentage}
{optionOneCount} out of {total} votes
Would you rather {question.optionTwo.text}
{optionTwoPercentage}
{optionTwoCount} out of {total} votes
{ answer === OPTION_TWO ? : null }
)} } export default LeaderCard
